channel.title: FOSS on genericSpecimen's blog
channel.description: Recent content in FOSS on genericSpecimen's blog

item.title: FOSS Android Applications
item.description: Android is an open source linux-based mobile operating system. While this statement can be considered to be true, there’s more to keep in mind. Android seems to be on it’s way to becoming more and more of an proprietary operating system.

item.title: The Android Debug Bridge
item.description: Android Debug Bridge (adb) is a command-line tool that lets you communicate with an actual device or an emulator. If you have experience with developing Android applications, you might be quite familiar with this nifty tool.
